title: Test Login Successful
manualSteps: 1. Open a clean browser instance and navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Verify that the page title contains 'Swag Labs' and both the Username and Password fields are visible.
3. Locate the Username input field (placeholder='Username').
4. Clear any pre-filled text and type the exact value test_user.
5. Locate the Password input field (placeholder='Password').
6. Clear any pre-filled text and type the exact value secret_sauce.
7. Locate the Login button (text='Login').
8. Click the Login button.
9. Wait for the browser to finish navigation.
10. Verify the current URL is https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html.
11. Verify that the inventory page header (class='title') contains the text 'Products'.
12. Logout and close the browser to clean up the test environment.

title: Test User Locked
manualSteps: Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
Wait until the login form is fully rendered
Locate the Username input field by its placeholder text 'Username'
Enter the exact text locked_out_user into the Username field
Locate the Password input field by its placeholder text 'Password'
Enter the exact text secret_sauce into the Password field
Locate the Login button
Click the Login button
Wait for the error container to appear
Assert that the error container is visible
Assert that the error text is exactly Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out.
Take a screenshot of the error for evidence (optional but recommended)
Mark the test as passed if all assertions are true

title: Add the item to the checkout
manualSteps: 1. Navigate to the inventory page (URL containing /inventory.html).
2. Verify that at least one inventory item is displayed.
3. Locate the first inventory item card.
4. Within the first item card, identify the ‘Add to cart’ button (text equals ‘Add to cart’).
5. Click the ‘Add to cart’ button.
6. Verify that the button text changes to ‘Remove’ (indicating the item was added).
7. Locate the shopping-cart icon (class shopping_cart_container) in the header.
8. Click the shopping-cart icon.
9. Verify that the browser navigates to the cart page (URL containing /cart.html).
10. Verify that exactly one item is listed in the cart.
11. Within the cart item, verify that the item price is displayed as $29.99.

title: Check first item
manualSteps: 1. Open the browser and navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Wait for the login page to load completely (check that the Username and Password fields are visible).
3. In the input field with placeholder "Username", type standard_user exactly as provided.
4. In the input field with placeholder "Password", type secret_sauce exactly as provided.
5. Click the "Login" button.
6. Verify that the URL changes to https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html and the inventory page loads.
7. Locate the first inventory item card on the page (top-left item).
8. Within that card, read the item title and confirm it is exactly 'Sauce Labs Backpack'.
9. Within the same card, read the item price and confirm it is exactly '$29.99'.
10. If both assertions pass, the test is successful; otherwise, log the mismatch as a failure.
